channel.title: Holes in NPCs and Objects
channel.description:
I'm getting some weird texture mapping issues where triangular holes are in everything. It goes away for a second if I switch resolutions only to reappear seconds later. Even on low settings these problems exist.
See for yourself: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96231107[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96229524[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96215056[/url]

item.title: Holes in NPCs and Objects
item.dc:creator: gonz0_12
item.description:
Must be my graphics card because same card with same issue reported here:

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=492710#post492710

Read full topic

item.title: Holes in NPCs and Objects
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Suhov
item.description:
Please, look at my post in the near thread: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=492106&postcount=2

In short, your GPU for some reason is unable to handle the game. Either your GPU is outdated, not designed for demanding games or overheating.

Read full topic
